alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 20 at 3:33PM MDT until March 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 PM Tuesday to midnight MDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
